title: EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE
description: Returns TRUE if the value matches any of the given compare_values (case-insensitive); otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: â€¦ compare_strings
parameters.description: One or more values to compare with the given value.

examples:
EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE(Status, "in progress", "completed")
-- Returns TRUE if Status is "in progress" or "completed" (case-insensitive); otherwise, returns FALSE.
